ul_217668: How to rename or delete an alias permanently from system?
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_47341: help alias

$ alias savealias='alias > ~/.bash-aliases'
$ savealias

alias acs='apt-cache show'
alias acss='apt-cache search'
alias loadalias='. ~/.bash-aliases '
alias mq='mailq | grep "^[0-9A-Z]"'
alias savealias='alias >~/.bash-aliases'
alias ttystat='echo $(tty) $TERM ${COLUMNS}x$LINES'
alias where='type -all'
alias which='type -path'

ul_217668: sed -i 's/alias shh/alias shh2/1' ~/.kshrc
unalias shh
source ~/.kshrc
